revised_title: Revisiting the Dynamics of Superfluids and Chemical Potentials in Non-Equilibrium States
tldr: The authors examine the dynamics of superfluids and chemical potentials in non-equilibrium states near a normal-superconducting interface. They discuss the electrodynamics of supercurrents and the behavior of chemical potentials, providing a clearer understanding of the processes occurring in these systems. The study also compares and contrasts different approaches to understanding these phenomena, such as the time-dependent Ginzburg-Landau theory.
